formalpara.title: Description
formalpara.para: A SYNTAX ERROR in AnchorVars[6] occurs with the following message.

listitem.screen: AnchorVars[6] nm←⍪⊃,/(⊂0⍴⊂''),Split¨nm ⍝ Split names and prepare

formalpara.title: Analysis
formalpara.para: The Split is missing a set of parentheses to ensure that the binding of the left argument occurs as the last thing.
